Today the House took action to lower costs at the grocery store and gas pump.

Our #LowerFoodAndFuelCostsAct delivers a boost to America's farmers and ranchers in the face of challenges from Russia's war in Ukraine and ensures families aren’t bearing the burdens of this crisis. https://t.co/I5ofg3iI1m

Two years ago, SCOTUS ruled that you can't be fired from your job for who you love or how you identify.

I'm pushing to enshrine that right into law by championing the #EqualityAct, as well as fighting back against a growing movement to marginalize and silence LGBTQ+ Americans.

The bipartisan Recovering America's Wildlife Act is the most significant bill in a generation to conserve our nation's wildlife.
